      Method parameters in com.github.triceo.splitlog.api with type arguments of type Follower 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean LogWatch.isHandingDown(MessageMeasure<? extends Number,Follower> measure)
      Whether or not particular MessageMeasure is being automatically handed down to new Followers.
      boolean LogWatch.startHandingDown(MessageMeasure<? extends Number,Follower> measure, String id)
      Every new Follower from now on will immediately receive a new MessageMetric instance with a given ID that is using the given measure instance.
